attributes.action: ensure ww2 normandy vets recieve funding for one last journey to normandy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i feel it is our duty as sons and daughters, grand children and great grand children of the men and women who fought for the free world during ww2.
to make sure these brave people recieve funding to make one last journey to commemorate the fallen during the normany(d.day)landings of 1944

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
